robot_capabilities.snow_plow_robot: Capable of clearing wide areas of snow from roads and sidewalks. Equipped with front-mounted plow, GPS, standard camera, and snow-dump container. Cannot manipulate objects but excels at bulk clearing and route following.
robot_capabilities.differential_drive_robot_with_arm: Can perform targeted snow clearing, spread salt, open blocked paths, and handle Big debris. Equipped with robotic arm, depth camera, lidar, GPS, and de-icing sprayer. Suitable for narrow paths, bus stops, stairs, and entry points.

robot_morphology.snow_plow_robot: Payload: ~40 kg, Speed: 0–2.5 m/s, Weight: 70 kg, Size: 1200 x 650 x 600 mm, Plow Width: ~700 mm, Snow Container: ~50 L
robot_morphology.differential_drive_robot_with_arm: Payload: ~10 kg, Speed: 0–1.8 m/s, Weight: 50 kg, Size: 850 x 500 x 550 mm, Arm Reach: ~0.8 m

task_specific_rules: to remove snow form any road or place robot must goto that road or place first
to remove any big debrids from the road or place, the robot must go to that road or place first
task_replanning_rules: If snow plow path is blocked, reroute or wait for clearance.
If arm robot is unable to finish a tight corner, escalate to manual alert or retry with different approach.
If snowfall resumes heavily, prioritize clearing school entrances and transport routes first.
